dct_title_s: Africa according to the best authorities
dct_description_sm: This was the first folio-sized map of Africa to be engraved and printed in the United States of America.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on given in "British Statute Miles."
Carey's general atlas. Philadelphia : Mathew Carey, 1804.
There are several geographical inaccuracies and fictitious tribal names.
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
